channel.title: A Few Questions
channel.description: Hi,I Just Created And Run A RSC Server (Devine Pk V.5) (Thanks Dummis) Just Some Questions I Would Like To Ask. 1.Does This Server Come With A Pickup Command..If It Does How Do I Use It? 2.How Do I Change The Welcome Messages? --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Client Questions 1.How Do Change The Fourms Name? 2.How Do I Change The Colour Of The Buttons? ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- No I don't Have Any Experence On RSC Servers..Yes I Do Code My Own RS2 Server.Please Do Not Flame Me As I Am Not Demanding You Tell Me I Am Asking Freindly..So Can Anyone Help Out A Newbie? Thanks If You Help Or Read --Brent.

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @extacy extacy
item.description:
@extacy wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:17, topic:221706”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=291117.msg2348332#msg2348332 date=1216836951]
WTF…Seriously…I Just Need Help And All You Guys Maybe Girls…Go Flaming Me…I’ve Just Started Coding RSC And No I Did Not “LEACH” Me And My Friend Are Redoing A Whole Server…“Just-Angry”…So If Your Going To Port Please Let It Be About Helping Me.
[/quote]you arent coding rsc, you will never code rsc untill you learn java first like all the ONLY rsc coders did. how can you code in a language you dont even know the basics about? btw im talking about java not english…
and asking for help every step of the way of making an rsc server, and getting exact code and c+ping it into an rsc server isnt coding, its leeching and nobody here helps leechers. you arent a coder so stfu about it. learn java then code rsc, or gtfo.

off topic: why didnt you respond to my pm, extacy? :([/quote]

didnt get around to answering it lol, give me a sec

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

how to change welcome to
go on client.java
type CTRL+ F
then type in welcome to in finding box
then u search when u see the welcome text like
if the normal name is now (welcome to hugescape)
change the huge to (welcome to myscape)

About changing buttons usee a file called sprites.
click on it u see a bunch of pictures of ur client
example text boxes and so on replace pieces to change the
boxes colors or shape.

to color names of ur welcome text or when they type ::info
or at qeustpoint book ect.

type this if you want white example “@whi@youretext” 9843"
normally its all there u just need to change @whi@ part to the color u want
green is @gre@ red is @red@ yellow is @yell@ and so.

I hope this little bit of information helped u iam just a new coder like u
i have my server running for like 2weeks just search it up.

I love moparisthebest.com it helped me alot.!

Read full topic

Just Some Questions I Would Like To Ask.

2.How Do I Change The Welcome Messages?

Client Questions

2.How Do I Change The Colour Of The Buttons?

No I don’t Have Any Experence On RSC Servers…Yes I Do Code My Own RS2 Server.Please Do Not Flame Me As I Am Not Demanding You Tell Me I Am Asking Freindly…So Can Anyone Help Out A Newbie?
Thanks If You Help Or Read
–Brent.[/quote]

Client
